name: dancing
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the activity of moving the body and feet to music: The country has a strong tradition of arts and crafts, dancing, and music. There will be cocktails followed by dinner and dancing. Her hobbies are working out, running, and dancing.dancing lesson We signed up for dancing lessons for our anniversary.dancing partner She had several very pleasant dancing partners throughout the evening. More examplesFewer examplesThe show includes singing, dancing, and comedy.If you love dancing, you will love this production. His dancing is spectacular, but his acting is not great.The overall quality of the dancing was impressive.If they win, there will be dancing in the streets.The dancing was obviously not choreographed, and he looked like someone's dad at a wedding.
